lexUnit.name: tongue.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the fleshy muscular organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in humans) articulating speech

sentence.text: You can kiss a friend on the lips , but if you put your tongue in her mouth it becomes something else .
